intro: Neomanniophyton, commonly known as the African milk bush, is a genus of flowering plants native to southern Africa. Neomanniophyton species are often found in arid or semi-arid regions, thriving in well-drained soils. The plant's latex is toxic and has been used in traditional medicine, though its medicinal properties remain under study.
